statements.name: Req_Filter_LatLong
statements.label: The Consumer shall only receive well-formed lat-long values

statements.name: Req_Filter_Alt
statements.label: The Consumer shall only receive well-formed altitude values

statements.name: Req_Wellformed_LatLong
statements.label: The Consumer shall only receive well-formed lat-long values

statements.name: Req_Wellformed_Alt
statements.label: The Consumer shall only receive well-formed alt values
Consumer status shall never be false

annexes.name: resolute
annexes.sourceText:
{**
			prove Req_Wellformed_LatLong(this.Consumer, \"Req_Wellformed_LatLong\", this.Filter, this.c3, Coordinate.Impl)
			prove Req_Wellformed_Alt(this.Consumer, \"Req_Wellformed_Alt\", this.Filter, this.c3, Coordinate.Impl)
		**}
